attachments.fallback: Docker Blog: Docker Desktop for Windows Home is here! - Docker Blog
attachments.title: Docker Desktop for Windows Home is here! - Docker Blog
attachments.text: Last year we announced that Docker had released a preview of Docker Desktop with WSL 2 integration. We are now pleased to announce that we have completed the work to enable experimental support for Windows Home WSL 2 integration. This means that Windows Insider users on 19040 or higher can now install and use Docker Desktop!
